en.title: How to Stop Your Cat from Biting: Understanding Gentle vs. Aggressive Bites
en.content:
Getting bitten by your cat can be painful. By understanding the reasons behind biting, you can take the right steps to correct this behavior.

The Difference Between Gentle Biting and Serious Biting

Gentle biting (love bites) is an extension of play or a form of communication — the cat controls the force. Serious biting is triggered by fear, pain, or overstimulation and can result in deep wounds.

How to Address Biting Habits

When your cat bites, say "ouch" in a low, firm voice and immediately stop playing. Avoid playing with your cat using your bare hands — always use toys instead so your cat learns that hands are not for biting. It's also important to give your cat plenty of active play sessions with feather wands and chase games to help them burn off excess energy.

zh.title: 猫咪咬人习惯的纠正方法：轻咬与真咬的区别
zh.content:
被猫咬确实很疼。了解猫咪咬人的原因，采取正确的应对方式就能有效改善这一行为。

轻咬与真咬的区别

轻咬（爱的轻咬）是玩耍或交流的延伸，猫咪会控制力度。而真咬则是出于恐惧、疼痛或过度刺激，可能会造成较深的伤口。

咬人习惯的纠正方法

被咬时用低沉的声音说"好痛"，并立即停止互动。不要用手直接和猫玩耍，请使用玩具代替，让猫学会"手不是用来咬的"。同时，通过逗猫棒和追逐游戏让猫咪充分消耗精力也很重要。
